ygData.subject: Fwd: RE: [EQ-Bards] Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: When we get duel weild will we be able to play an instrument and use a weapon at the same time? Has anyone maxed out their hand to hand before getting duel
ygData.messageBody:
When we get duel weild will we be able to play an
instrument and use a weapon at the same time? Has
anyone maxed out their hand to hand before
getting duel weild? And when does song weaving
come into effect or is it something that just
gradually comes into being as we level? And
lastly, what would you say our very most
important stats are in order? Thanks in advance
for any help! =)


=====
Kinrea Keres 44th Teir'dal Warrior
<Chaotic Horde>
Sinarya L'achesis 25th Teir'dal Necromancer
Lereny 12th Half elf Bard
Zyrrah 7th Teir'dal Cleric
Saryrn Server
